layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x50
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x50
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x18
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x18
        LayoutInline {A} at (0,0) size 167x18 [color=#008000]
          LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 167x18
            text run at (0,0) width 167: "This link should be green."
        LayoutText {#text} at (166,0) size 226x18
          text run at (166,0) width 226: " (do not hover over it or activate it)"
